name: The Three Stooges
description:
The Three Stooges is an adventure-arcade game developed by Cinemaware and Incredible Technologies. It was originally released in 1987. Cinemaware published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
The Three Stooges is available on Game Boy Advance, Apple II, PlayStation and NES.
It was scored by David Thiel (Amiga) and Gavan Anderson (NES).
